name: Iced Peach Tea Lemonade
description: Wave goodbye to those pricey Starbucks® pit stops and say hello to your wallet’s new BFF! Coffee shop runs can cost you $5 a pop and their cold bevvies are often loaded with sugar. Sip, chill, and sparkle with this DIY drink that’s as effortless as it is delicious.
preparation: In a large glass, pour boiling water over tea bag. Steep 5–7 min.
Fill a tall glass with ice. Add brewed tea and lemonade; stir 10 times. Garnish rim with lemon wedge, if desired.
tips: No Bella Bellini Tea? Swap it for Pink Lemonade Herbal Tea Blend and a splash of peach juice.
